attributes.action: Significantly reduce taxation on tobacco products to reflect the absurd restriction of rights introduced by this nanny state loving government,smokers pay far more than they cost the system in taxation for the privelige of smoking-and now we have lost most of that,maybe that will financially make up for the thousands of extra sick days which will be taken as a result of being forced outside in the winter.You can't have it all ways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
